title: Fix Daily Commitment Popup Logic & Mobile Responsiveness
description: Implement corrected commitment popup logic where 'No' responses are final for the day and 'Yes' responses remain changeable. Redesign popup for mobile responsiveness with improved UX following EasyA-inspired compact design principles.
